ProjectTitle: Ultrasound-assisted solvent extraction for pharmaceutical applications
InitialFeedbackHistory: 26/07/2022 [REDACTED] submitted your DMP as final, please note that the DMP that FWO asks within 6 months after start of the project is considered the initial DMP, I therefore moved the DMP to initial, the final DMP is the DMP that FWO will ask you to write at the end of your fellowship to submit with the final report. [REDACTED] you like to update your DMP during the fellowship you can submit this as intermediate. 4.
